scripts.build-menu-css: scss src/themes/menu.scss > dest/css/menu.css && uglifycss dest/css/menu.css > dest/css/menu.min.css
scripts.build-animation-css: scss src/themes/menu-animation.scss > dest/css/menu-animation.css && uglifycss dest/css/menu-animation.css > dest/css/menu-animation.min.css
scripts.build-phone-css: scss src/themes/menu-phone.scss > dest/css/menu-phone.css && uglifycss dest/css/menu-phone.css > dest/css/menu-phone.min.css
scripts.build-ie-css: scss src/themes/menu-ie.scss > dest/css/menu-ie.css && uglifycss dest/css/menu-ie.css > dest/css/menu-ie.min.css
scripts.build-all-css: scss src/themes/index.scss > dest/css/menu.all.css && uglifycss dest/css/menu.all.css > dest/css/menu.all.min.css
scripts.build-css: npm run build-menu-css && npm run build-animation-css && npm run build-phone-css && npm run build-ie-css && npm run build-all-css
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-css
